[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@gcorevideo/rtckit](./rtckit.md) &gt; [WebrtcStreaming](./rtckit.webrtcstreaming.md)

## WebrtcStreaming class

A wrapper around WhipClient to facilitate creating WebRTC streams in a browser

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class WebrtcStreaming 
```

## Example


```typescript
const webrtc = new WebrtcStreaming('https://example.com/whip/0aeb');
await webrtc.openSourceStream({ audio: true, video: true });
await webrtc.preview(document.querySelector('video'));
await webrtc.run();
webrtc.toggleVideo(false);
...
webrtc.close();
```

<tr><td>

[toggleAudio(active)](./rtckit.webrtcstreaming.toggleaudio.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Mutes or unmutes the audio track. A muted audio track will produce silence (at some constant audio level) and send some RTP over the network.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[toggleVideo(active)](./rtckit.webrtcstreaming.togglevideo.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Mutes or unmutes the video track. Muted track will produce black frames and send some RTP over the network.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
